title: Migrations: Differ doesn't use configured ValueComparer for DefaultValue
body:
## File a bug

### Include your code

[Project that reproduce bug](https://github.com/Razorik/not-removing-migrations-example)

#### Steps to reproduce

1. Start postgres with command `docker-compose up -d` in solution root directory
2. Uncomment lines 11-13 and 21-25 in ExampleContext.cs file (skip this step if you want to make sure that migrations can be created and removed)
3. Go to App directory
4. Run command `dotnet ef migrations add FirstMigration` (or any another migration name)
5. Run command `dotnet ef migrations remove`

### Include verbose output

#### Output with commented lines 11-13 and 21-25

dotnet-ef version: 6.0.10
Database provider: Npgsql.EntityFrameworkCore.PostgreSQL 6.0.7
Target framework: .NET 6.0
Operating system: macOS 11.6 (20G165)
IDE: JetBrains Rider 2022.1.1, Build #RD-221.5591.20, built on April 28, 2022
